meanings.sent1: The coastland was filled with palm trees and sandy beaches.
meanings.sent2: We took a walk along the coastland to enjoy the ocean view.
meanings.sent3: The seagulls in the coastland seemed to be having a beach party.
meanings.sent4: The coastland stretched out like a welcoming arm towards the sea.
meanings.sent5: The coastland sparkled under the sun, inviting us to explore its beauty.

meanings.definition: The area of land that borders a coast.
meanings.sent1: The coastland was dotted with small fishing villages.
meanings.sent2: Many tourists visit the coastland during the summer months.
meanings.sent3: The coastland looked like a colorful ribbon hugging the shoreline.
meanings.sent4: The coastland whispered secrets of the sea to those who listened.
meanings.sent5: The coastland was a patchwork of green fields and golden beaches.
